---
id: tigris-update-bucket
title: "Update bucket settings"
description:
  "Updates the bucket settings like public access, storage class, and object
  ACL."

---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update bucket settings"}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v1/providers/{provider_id}/orgs/{org_id}/buckets/{bucket_name}"}
></MethodEndpoint>

Updates the bucket settings like public access, storage class, and object ACL.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
></Heading>

<details
  style={{ marginBottom: "1rem" }}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary style={{}}>
    <h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>
      Path Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary>
  <div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{
          name: "provider_id",
          in: "path",
          required: true,
          description: "Provider ID",
          schema: { type: "string" },
        }}
      ></ParamsItem>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{
          name: "org_id",
          in: "path",
          required: true,
          description: "Organization ID",
          schema: { type: "string" },
        }}
      ></ParamsItem>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{
          name: "bucket_name",
          in: "path",
          required: true,
          description: "Bucket name",
          schema: { type: "string" },
        }}
      ></ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>
<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}>
  <TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}>
    <details
      style={{}}
      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}>
        <h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>
          Body
        </h3>
        <strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong>
      </summary>
      <div style={{ textAlign: "left", marginLeft: "1rem" }}></div>
      <ul style={{ marginLeft: "1rem" }}>
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"public"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"boolean"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{
            type: "boolean",
            description:
              "If set to true, the bucket will be publicly accessible. Default is false.",
          }}
        ></SchemaItem>
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"enable_object_acl"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"boolean"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{
            type: "boolean",
            description:
              "If set to true, per object ACL will be enabled. Default is false.",
          }}
        ></SchemaItem>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </TabItem>
</MimeTabs>
